itemDisplayName: Create HDInsight Linux Cluster with Hue app on Edge Node
description: Template creates an HDInsight Linux cluster in a virtual network with another vm as an edge node that is bootstrapped with the clusters configurations and Hue is installed on edge node.
summary: Template creates an HDInsight Linux cluster in a virtual network with another vm as an edge node that is bootstrapped with the clusters configurations and Hue is installed on edge node.
